subject: Data
title: Citizen Science: Everyone's a Data Collector
description: A quick win: understand Citizen Science: Everyone's a Data Collector.

hook.text: Every Christmas, thousands of Americans count birds. Their data has tracked 50 years of migration changes.

buildup.text: Citizen science projects recruit volunteers to collect and submit data â€” bird counts, star classifications, air quality.

discovery.text: iNaturalist has collected over 150 million observations of plants and animals from volunteers worldwide.

twist.text: Some citizen science datasets are now larger and more detailed than anything professional scientists could collect.

climax.text: When data collection is open to everyone, the scale of what science can observe explodes.

punchline.text: Open data isn't just about releasing data. It's about who gets to create it.

quiz.question: How many observations has iNaturalist collected?
